title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 303.2 - Utilization of other organizations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 303.2 - Utilization of other organizations

State Regulations

No social services district shall utilize, purchase or
otherwise obtain assistance, care or services from any organization, institution or facility which discriminates on the basis of race, color, national origin, age, sex, religion or handicap, as set forth in section
303.1
of this Part or otherwise, nor shall it participate in any program that so
discriminates. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
303.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
